com.quantcomponents.algo
Interface IOrderStatusListener

All Known Subinterfaces:
ITradingAgent
All Known Implementing Classes:
AverageCrossingTradingAgent
public interface IOrderStatusListener

Listener to order status. Used to monitor the state changes of an order. All the methods except onOrderFilled(String, int, boolean, double) are optional, depending on which functionality is implementsd by the broker/interface to the market.

Method Summary
 void onOrderCancelled(String orderId)
          Optionally called by the execution service when an order has been cancelled
 void onOrderFilled(String orderId, int filled, boolean full, double averagePrice)
          Called by the execution service when an order has been filled
 void onOrderStatus(String orderId, String status)
          Optionally called by the execution service for status changes other than the previous ones
 void onOrderSubmitted(String orderId, boolean active)
          Optionally called by the execution service when an order has been submitted
 

Method Detail

onOrderSubmitted

void onOrderSubmitted(String orderId,
                      boolean active)
Optionally called by the execution service when an order has been submitted

Parameters:
orderId - ID of the submitted order
active - true if the order is active on the broker platform, false otherwise

onOrderFilled

void onOrderFilled(String orderId,
                   int filled,
                   boolean full,
                   double averagePrice)
Called by the execution service when an order has been filled

Parameters:
orderId - ID of the order filled
filled - the amount filled
full - true if the order has been filled completely
averagePrice - the average price of execution of the amount filled

onOrderCancelled

void onOrderCancelled(String orderId)
Optionally called by the execution service when an order has been cancelled

Parameters:
orderId - ID of the order cancelled

onOrderStatus

void onOrderStatus(String orderId,
                   String status)
Optionally called by the execution service for status changes other than the previous ones

Parameters:
orderId - ID of the order that has changed status
status - value of the new status
